Package patreon.java.resources

Class PledgeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • patreon.java.resources.shared.BaseResource
      • patreon.java.resources.PledgeEvent
  • public class PledgeEvent
extends BaseResource
    The record of a pledging action taken by the user, or that action's failure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getAmountCents()
      Returns the amount (in the currency in which the patron paid) of the underlying event.
      Campaign getCampaign()
      Returns the campaign being pledged to.
      java.lang.String getCurrencyCode()
      Returns the ISO code of the currency of the event.
      java.lang.String getDate()
      Returns the date and time that this event occurred.

      Returns the pledging user.

      Returns the status of the underlying payment.
      Tier getTier()
      Returns the tier associated with this pledge event.

      Returns the ID of the tier associated with the pledge.
      java.lang.String getTierTitle()
      Returns the title of the tier associated with the pledge.

      Returns the event type
